data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga is the ultimate Lego game that evolves the series into an addicting open-world experience. And this one can definitely be enjoyed on the Steam Deck!
- **Performance:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★★ (5/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
